ns2:subject.label: Zulu
ns2:subject.addressLine2: 4080 Foreign Languages Building, 707 South Mathews, Urbana
ns2:subject.subjectComment: Subjects associated with this department include: Arabic (ARAB), Bamana (BMNA), English as an International Language (EIL), English as a Second Language (ESL), Modern Greek (GRKM), Hindi (HNDI), Lingala (LGLA), Linguistics (LING), Persian (PERS), Sanskrit (SNSK), Swahili (SWAH), Turkish (TURK), Wolof (WLOF), and Zulu (ZULU).
ns2:subject.collegeDepartmentDescription: Department Head: James Yoon Department Office, 4080 Foreign Languages Building, 707 South Mathews, Urbana, 217-333-3563 Subjects associated with this department include: Arabic (ARAB), Bamana (BMNA), English as an International Language (EIL), English as a Second Language (ESL), Modern Greek (GRKM), Hindi (HNDI), Lingala (LGLA), Linguistics (LING), Persian (PERS), Sanskrit (SNSK), Swahili (SWAH), Turkish (TURK), Wolof (WLOF), and Zulu (ZULU). www.linguistics.uiuc.edu
